welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ureshinomachi-shimojuku, a charming city known for its hot springs and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourself in the local culture and discover all the wonderful sights and experiences this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nagasaki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Nagasaki Airport handles flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Nagasaki Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
